info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 03 at 3:49PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN GEAUGA...EASTERN LAKE AND NORTHWESTERN ASHTABULA COUNTIES THROUGH 430 PM EST... At 349 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Painesville, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Painesville, Ashtabula, Chardon, Geneva-On-The-Lake, Mentor, Geneva, Madison, North Kingsville, Perry, Kirtland, Austinburg, North Perry, Thompson, Kirtland Hills, Edgewood, Plymouth Center, and North Madison. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
